resources.string: Number of courses you have chosen is

This app developed by international Nankai University students: 
- SAID Al SAIDI 
- MOHAMMED AL MAHI 
- AMMAR KHALID 
- HIDER HUSAM AHMED 
- MOHAMMED SAAD ALI

This is Nankai university GPA calculator for international students to help them calculate their GPA, designed by students as part of their assignment. This app calculate the GPA according to below formula:
 - A (100 - 85)
 - B (75 - 84)
 - C ( 74 -60)
 - D ( below 60)
The app still in development process, there will be updates from time to time.

This application is designed to help students in Nankai university to calculate their GPA by providing for them simple application with easy features such as:
 - Calculate style.
 - Supports US and Global calculation style of GPA.
 - Supports English and Chinese language.
 The app designed by software engineering students in the Nankai University.
 The app does not collect any personal information or share them with third party.
 The app does not required any permission to access camera, real location GPS, storage data or change settings in the phone.
 The app designed by Alsaidisoft and his friends to help students calculate their GPA.
 You can contact us via email: saeed.alsaidi.developer@gmail.com
